Field Label: RADx-rad Study ID; Subject ID; Datavent ID
Identifier for groups of patients
Date when patient was enrolled in the  study and the samples were collected
Which timepoint does this clinical sample pertain to?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: Each participant is followed for up to 12 timepoints with one week in between each timepoint. Each timepoint corresponds to a specific smell card. There are 6 unique smell cards labeled as A-F. Each participant competes A-F in order and then repeats the cycle A-F so that each card is tested twice for a complete follow up.

Field Label: Number of days since the onset of symptoms when the patient's sample was collected
Number of days since the first COVID vaccination when the patient's sample was collected
Number of days since the second COVID vaccination when the patient's sample was collected
Number of days since patient tested positive for COVID when the patient's sample was collected
Covid vaccine type
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: Pfizer-BioNTech | Moderna | Novavax | J&J/Jansen | Pfizer-BioNTech Bivalent| Moderna Bivalent

Field Label: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 0, No | 98,  not sure/prefer not to answer

Field Label: How many COVID-19 vaccine doses have you received?
Field Note: use 0 if covid_vaccine == 0, leave blank if covid_vaccine == 98

Field Label: Participant Testing Disease Status
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Asymptomatic | 2, Pre-symptomatic illness | 3, Mild/Moderate outpatient illness | 4, Acute illness | 5, Severe/Critical inpatient illness| 6, Exposed | 9, Convalescent illiness

Field Label: Test Method Target
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Antibody | 2, Antigen | 3, Nucleic acid/PCR | 4, Nucleic acid/Isothermal | 5, Molecular/host response | 6, Biochemical marker (eg, pH) | 90, Other, Specify

Field Label: Other method target
Test manufacturer (or LDT) and test name
Specimen Type
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Anterior nasal swab | 2, Mid-turbinate nasal swab | 3, Nasopharyngeal swab | 4, Oropharyngeal swab | 5, Nasal lavage | 6, Saliva | 7, Sputum | 8, Whole blood | 90, Other, Specify

Field Label: Other specimen type
Specimen Collector
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Self-collect | 2, Health Care Provider collected | 90, Other, Specify

Field Label: Other specimen collector
PCR cycle threshold
Raw test result (if not a Positive/Negative/Failed report)
Test result
Other test result
Unit of other test result if applicable
Have you ever been diagnosed with COVID-19?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 0, No | 98,  not sure/prefer not to answer

Field Label: Tobacco Use
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, No tobacco use| 1, Current Tobacco user| 2, Former Tobacco User| 98, Don't Know | 99, Prefer not to answer

Field Label: An individual's sense of being a man, woman, boy, girl, genderqueer, nonbinary, etc.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Man | 1, Woman | 2, Non-binary | 3, Transgender Man/Female-to-male (FTM) | 4, Transgender woman/Male-to-female (MTF) | 5, Gender non-binary/Genderqueer/Gender nonconforming | 6, Agender | 7, Bigender | 96, None of these describe me | 99, Prefer not to answer
